name: Katana (goingafk)
description:
We are Evolved Goats!
Remember to slice door

A game made by @_goingafk_ (Programming) and @CemDaGOAT (All background and most sprites) 

A game made for the One Button Game Jam, where the idea of a running samurai destroying all that comes into his paths, are you up for the challenge? 

Be attentive to use LeftClick to progress through the level.

As you run across the rooftop into the courtyard then go inside the dojo face enemies running at you with shurikens and try to slice them as fast as you can

Cem's portfolio: https://2001cemer.wixsite.com/cem1



Game was created using Unreal Engine 5
